remarks: The properties of a complex vector space, which is an Abelian group (i.e. the vectors, with the operation of vector addition) accompanied by a scalar multiplication operation on the field of complex numbers.  The variable ` W ` was chosen because ` _V ` is already used for the universal class.  (Contributed by NM, 3-Nov-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

vci.2 $e |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
vci.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
